title: [BUG] SKShaper/DrawShapedText ignores SKPaint.TextAlign property
body: **Description** When drawing text with DrawShapedText, the specified TextAlign in SKPaint is ignored. **Code** ``` using var paint= new SKPaint { ... TextAlign = SKTextAlign.Center ...}; canvas.DrawShapedText(shaper, "test", width / 2f, (height / 2f) + (paint.FontMetrics.XHeight / 2), paint); ``` Would result in: When I would expect the same behaviour as DrawText as for the alignment. I am opening a PR to fix it,
